author: rodolfo.miranda
title: Grow Latin America, Grow Cardano
description:
How can we grow the Cardano ecosystem in Latin America?
How we can empower Latam's people to impact the region and the world?
importance: Mass adoption requires a global view. Initiatives that focus on emerging economies such as Latin America are key to exponential engagement.
success: A wide spectrum of people from Latin America or with connections to Latin America coming together and forming teams to grow our ecosystem.
